about_the_game:
The Aegis Decent album is a collaboration of heavy metal inspired music and score. The entire soundtrack was created specifically for the game by inhouse talent and passion. 13 tracks, 27 minutes, containing both composed and music tracks have been put together to create an experience like you might encounter in the high energy gameplay of Aegis Decent.
Contributing Artists: Nathan Smith & James Maxwell
detailed_description:
The Aegis Decent album is a collaboration of heavy metal inspired music and score. The entire soundtrack was created specifically for the game by inhouse talent and passion. 13 tracks, 27 minutes, containing both composed and music tracks have been put together to create an experience like you might encounter in the high energy gameplay of Aegis Decent.
Contributing Artists: Nathan Smith & James Maxwell
legal_notice: Aegis Descent was developed by Traega Entertainment, LLC. Traega Entertainment, LLC © 2015 - 2022 and related logos are registered trademarks of Traega Entertainment, LLC in the U.S. All other trademarks or trade names are the property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.
name: Aegis Descent Soundtrack
short_description: Descend into the world of metal and maelstrom that is the soundtrack for Aegis Decent. From hard driving metal tracks like ”Crush”, to the deep foreboding explorations of “Expiration Day”, this soundtrack is a love letter to all things metal and metal fans alike.
